attributes.action: Deport foreign nationals who commit serious crimes
attributes.additional_details:
That the British Government should override human rights act considerations and authorise the deportation of all foreign nationals 'extended hospitality in this country', who repay such generosity by committing serious criminal acts, eg Murder, Terrorism , engagement in people trafficking /prostitution , Rape,Robbery,Causing grievous bodily harm with intent, etc
The Human Rights of ALL who live within the laws of this Country should supercede those who seriously abuse them, having no right to be here.
